Dec. 6, 1981 D Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest (Section C)
Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest (Section C) 30 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest huddersfield-district-bba-contest-section-c
None
Huddersfield Town Hall, Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £40, 2nd £30, 3rd £20. 10 bands competed.
June 16, 2014, 2:01 p.m. June 25, 2016, 12:15 p.m.
1 Warren Band Duncan Beckley A Suite for Switzerland
2 Boarshurst 'B' Eric Landon Three Inventions
3 Thurlstone Brass Band Eric Crossley Rufford Abbey
